# Invitation to Qualify: Stage 1 - HVAC Renovation for Tunnel Mountain Village 2 (TMV2) Shower Building

## Post Information
### Contract Details
- **Reference Number**: cb-278-66273665
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-24-0028/A
- **Publication Date**: May 31, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 18, 2024, 4:00 PM MDT

### Project Overview
Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to submit their qualifications for the Stage 1 - HVAC renovation project at the Tunnel Mountain Village 2 (TMV2) Shower Building in Banff National Park. The project involves the supply, installation, and commissioning of a new HVAC system for the 4-season shower building.

### Project Requirements
The new HVAC system must provide heating, exhaust, air circulation/dehumidification, and an automated control system. The project is estimated to be between $100,001 and $250,000, taxes extra. The contractor must complete the work by September 30, 2024.

### Submission Guidelines
Please note that only faxed and emailed bids will be accepted as official submissions. Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted. The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. Emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted, and bid documents must be sent as email attachments.

### Selection Process
This is a two-stage selection process. Bidders responding to this selection process are requested to submit a bid in two stages. Stage 1 will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers. Qualified suppliers will be invited to submit a financial bid in Stage 2 based on the specifications and drawings.

### Important Dates
- **Stage 1 Closing Date**: June 18, 2024, 4:00 PM MDT
- **Stage 2 Invitation to Tender**: To be announced later
- **Contract Award Date**: To be announced later

### Additional Information
For more information, please visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service at http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
